device.description: A device that merely supports the MIDP 1.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
A device that merely supports the MIDP 1.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI.
A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards.
This device combines several features of different vendors. It can be used in case you want to use dynamic class loading etc for determing the device capabilities during runtime.
A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI.
A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI.
An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards.
An device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards along with the Wireless Messaging API 2.0.
A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 phone using the mpowerplayer for emulation.
